main event: A weather observer reported seeing a stream of 4-5 small white spherical objects in the sky on April 11, 1957.
interesting points: The objects covered an arc of about 25-30 degrees in the sky,The objects changed color from white to pink before disappearing,The observation lasted for 10 minutes,The objects were noted to have unusual motion,The sighting was documented in a report that may relate to other sightings in the area.
sighted object: stream of small white spherical objects
location: 3 miles west of Piedmont, South Dakota, USA
